reviewText: Super fun , speed was a favorite of mine when I was a young man and now I turn the kids onto him now . The plots are simple, fun , and funny, the whole family works together towards one goal , to win, and they encounter crazy machines and people along the way, every race is incredible, but with the mach 5, nothing is impossible, go speed go
My 5 year old son loves cars, loves racing and now loves Speed Racer (the original).  I bought him all 5 seasons and he loves it.  It's very innocent compared to todays cartoons.
